stories.Title: Find bugs in ChatGPT and get $20,000
stories.Description: A commitment to safety is evident through OpenAI's new "Bug Bounty program", which rewards people for finding bugs with amounts ranging from $200 to $20,000.

stories.Title: AI-Generated music is a threat to copyright
stories.Description: As developers train AI technology with artists' music catalogs, streaming services receive takedown requests from Universal Music Group.

stories.Title: Twitter is coming up with an AI project
stories.Description: According to reports, Elon Musk purchased 10,000 GPUs for Twitter's data centers, signaling his commitment to the company's in-house AI project.

stories.Title: Chatbots have a thirst for water
stories.Description: A new study has revealed that chatbot training has a significant impact on the environment, as it requires an unexpectedly high amount of water, raising concerns about sustainability.

stories.Title: Meta's new challenges
stories.Description: On the so-called "year of efficiency" declared by CEO Mark Zuckerberg, the company has been dealing with significant layoffs, concerns about the potential of the metaverse, and other struggles.

stories.Title: The benefits of PowerShell
stories.Description: In case you're thinking about using PowerShell, here's everything you need to know.

stories.Title: Databricks unveils Dolly 2.0
stories.Description: Dolly 2.0 it's the first open-source, instruction-following LLM. And the best part? It's now available for commercial use without any payment or data-sharing requirements.

stories.Title: Wolverine: The “regenerative” AI program
stories.Description: Until you get it right, this program will keep running and fixing errors in your code while explaining what went wrong.

stories.Title: Hyundai Motor Group announces investment in EV Industry
stories.Description: In a similar move to Kia, Hyundai plans to invest $18 billion in South Korea's electric vehicle industry through 2030.

stories.Title: Artemis 2 upper stage is ready for tests
stories.Description: NASA's Artemis 2 mission is getting closer to its goal of reaching the moon, with pre-flight testing currently underway for the upper stage of the Space Launch System in Cape Canaveral.

stories.Title: Twitter is no longer a company
stories.Description: A document has revealed that Twitter merged into a company named X Corp, as Elon Musk works on creating his own "everything" app, similar to China's WeChat.

title: Databricks welcomes Dolly 2.0, OpenAI offers rewards to people, The journey to the moon is approaching!
